title: Piss Bottle Nation, Gutfeld = Comedy GOLD 4.7.21
itunes:title: Piss Bottle Nation, Gutfeld = Comedy GOLD 4.7.21
description:
In episode 852, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and We Live In A (Film) Society co-host Sharilyn Vera to discuss peeing in bottles at Amazon, Matt Gaetz fighting for revenge porn, a sociologist just now learning about white supremacy, Texas and their packed baseball stadiums, the death of Yahoo Answers, Greg Gutfeld's new late-night show, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Our recent response to Representative Pocan
  2. Amazon apologizes for lying about pee — and attempts to shift the blame
  3. Former lawmaker says Gaetz fought ‘revenge porn’ law: ‘He thought that any picture was his to use as he wanted’
  4. That Time Matt Gaetz Stood Up For Floridians' Sacred Right To Revenge Porn
  5. Fears of White People Losing Out Permeate Capitol Rioters’ Towns, Study Finds
  6. Check Out the Stands as the Texas Rangers Play Their Home Opener in Front of a Packed Stadium
  7. RIP Yahoo Answers: It Died As It Lived, Needlessly And Stupidly
  8. 29 Strangely Hilarious Yahoo Answer Questions That'll Make You Giggle
  9. Greg Gutfeld promises he'll cancel 'cancel culture' in 'subversive' new late-night Fox News show
  10. WATCH: Greg Gutfeld gives sneak peak of new show
  11. LISTEN: Flying Lotus - kingmidas 'Lost' Remix Instrumental

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
